Summary: the best kind bar of all
text:
Chocolate cherry kind bars are yummy, and one of the lower calorie kind bars. I order by subscribe and save and I had to increase the frequency. A real treat - love em!
Reviews are misleading. I can tell that a lot of the reviews are for other flavors of kind bars, not cherry chocolate. No one would say they are peanutty! They are chocolaty and chewy and cherry-ie and delightful.
